definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: Why was what hair he had left already gray?
sentences.chinese: 他僅有的一撮頭髮爲什麼已經花白？

sentences.english: The old man has hoar hair.
He was a big, grey-haired miner named Tom.
sentences.chinese: 他叫湯姆，是一位大個子，花白頭髮的礦工。

sentences.english: The flower of this magnolia, mauve in button, blooms white.
sentences.chinese: 這株木蘭，在鈕釦裏的紅紫色的花，花白色。

sentences.english: They had full pelts of dark fur, no salt-and-peppershadings.
sentences.chinese: 它們皮毛烏黑靚麗，沒有一絲花白的跡象。

sentences.english: It had to be gray for a movie role out in Denver.
sentences.chinese: 我在丹佛拍電影時，頭髮必須是花白的。

sentences.english: Bugbane of the eastern united states having erect racemes of white flowers.
sentences.chinese: 美國東部升麻屬植物，花白色，直立總狀花序。

sentences.english: A white-bearded ancient man was walking over the hills and valleys of the world.
sentences.chinese: 一位鬍子花白的老人在世界各地的山脈及山谷間旅行。

sentences.english: Wrinkles have already climbed onto her forehead and her hair is getting grayer and grayer.
sentences.chinese: 皺紋已經爬滿了她的額頭，頭髮也越來越花白了。

sentences.english: A gray - haired woman in a light green pantsuit was being interviewed.
sentences.chinese: 一名頭髮花白的穿着淺綠色服裝的婦女正在接受採訪。

sentences.english: His crinkly hair was touched with grey…
sentences.chinese: 他捲曲的頭髮有些花白。

sentences.english: He is worried that her hair is becoming grayer slowly .
sentences.chinese: 她的頭髮漸漸變得花白，是他很擔心。

sentences.english: Males gray beard, and called females to help him pull.
sentences.chinese: 公猴鬍鬚花白了，就叫母猴幫他拔掉。

sentences.english: A sharp incongruence was perceived between his already grey hair and a seemingly 40-odd age.
sentences.chinese: 他的年紀，看起來不過四十多歲，頭髮卻已經花白。
